thread.title: VIDEO: Iwobi, Ramsey and Mertesacker show off basketball skills
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Iwobi, Ramsey and Mertesacker show off basketball skills

title: VIDEO: Iwobi, Ramsey and Mertesacker show off basketball skills
text:
0 11 Jan 2017 17:23:00 The Arsenal teamed up with Dunkin Devils to net some unbelievable football-inspired as part of a collaboration with NBA 
Take note, NBA. There's a new team in town... and they're pretty good! 
Ahead of NBA Global Games London, Arsenal teamed up with tricksters Dunkin Devils to try and net some football-inspired baskets... with devastating results. (Credit: C1 Photography) 
Aaron Ramsey, Per Mertesacker and Alex Iwobi were allowed some time away from training to take on the challenge of attempting to net a series of unbelievable trick shots. 
The trio each teamed up with a member of Dunkin Devils as they tried out a series of tricks from heel-flicks to slam dunks before they all came together at the end to try out one insane routine. 
Check out how it went down by watching the video above. You won't be disappointed... 
Watch the Denver Nuggets take on the Indiana Pacers at The O2 in London Live BT Sport 2 at 8pm on 12 January. You can also watch it simulcast on BT Sportâ€™s Facebook page and on the BT Sport Showcase channel. Related
